thread.title: Radwanska earns WTA Finals spot with win in Tianjin
thread.title_full: Radwanska earns WTA Finals spot with win in Tianjin

title: Radwanska earns WTA Finals spot with win in Tianjin
text:
Radwanska earns WTA Finals spot with win in Tianjin Sunday October 18, 2015 Print Article 
Band aid gets Radwanska a place at the WTA Finals in Singapore next month. — AFP pic BEIJING, Oct 18 — Poland’s Agnieszka Radwanska secured a slot in the WTA Finals with a straight-sets victory in the final of China’s Tianjin Open today. 
The 6-1, 6-2 win by the world number six over the much lower ranked Danka Kovinic, of Montenegro, ensures Radwanska place at the WTA Finals in Singapore next month. 
The second-seeded Pole broke five times without being broken herself to dismiss Kovinic in 58 minutes. 
The US$500,000 (RM2.1 million) WTA tournament had seen a run of upsets, and been beset by heavy air pollution. — AFP
